Derivates: ivānhe;ivāshe;ivārɨhe (hon.), they (hum.);ippepāṭṭithis much;ippō, ipputhis time, now;it_t_āthis way;ittālithis much/amount;id_ithis, here;īnethis way/direction; hence;īnemethus;īnemēlike this;īnāfor this;īnkɨhere

Notes: Kas. 218; Zv. Ir. 606. Tulu preserves the original suffixless form.
